tools.name: auth.clear
tools.description: Clears the authentication credentials, forcing a re-login on the next request.

tools.name: auth.refreshToken
tools.description: Manually triggers the token refresh process.

tools.name: docs.create
tools.description: Creates a new Google Doc. Can be blank or with Markdown content.

tools.name: docs.insertText
tools.description: Inserts text at the beginning of a Google Doc.

tools.name: docs.find
tools.description: Finds Google Docs by searching for a query in their title. Supports pagination.

tools.name: drive.findFolder
tools.description: Finds a folder by name in Google Drive.

tools.name: docs.move
tools.description: Moves a document to a specified folder.

tools.name: docs.getText
tools.description: Retrieves the text content of a Google Doc.

tools.name: docs.appendText
tools.description: Appends text to the end of a Google Doc.

tools.name: docs.replaceText
tools.description: Replaces all occurrences of a given text with new text in a Google Doc.

tools.name: docs.extractIdFromUrl
tools.description: Extracts the document ID from a Google Workspace URL.

tools.name: slides.getText
tools.description: Retrieves the text content of a Google Slides presentation.

tools.name: slides.find
tools.description: Finds Google Slides presentations by searching for a query. Supports pagination.

tools.name: slides.getMetadata
tools.description: Gets metadata about a Google Slides presentation.

tools.name: sheets.getText
tools.description: Retrieves the content of a Google Sheets spreadsheet.

tools.name: sheets.getRange
tools.description: Gets values from a specific range in a Google Sheets spreadsheet.

tools.name: sheets.find
tools.description: Finds Google Sheets spreadsheets by searching for a query. Supports pagination.

tools.name: sheets.getMetadata
tools.description: Gets metadata about a Google Sheets spreadsheet.

tools.name: drive.search
tools.description: Searches for files and folders in Google Drive. The query can be a simple search term, a Google Drive URL, or a full query string. For more information on query strings see: https://developers.google.com/drive/api/guides/search-files

tools.name: drive.downloadFile
tools.description: Downloads the content of a file from Google Drive to a local path. Note: Google Docs, Sheets, and Slides require specialized handling.

tools.name: calendar.list
tools.description: Lists all of the user's calendars.

tools.name: calendar.createEvent
tools.description: Creates a new event in a calendar.

tools.name: calendar.listEvents
tools.description: Lists events from a calendar. Defaults to upcoming events.

tools.name: calendar.getEvent
tools.description: Gets the details of a specific calendar event.

tools.name: calendar.findFreeTime
tools.description: Finds a free time slot for multiple people to meet.

tools.name: calendar.updateEvent
tools.description: Updates an existing event in a calendar.

tools.name: calendar.respondToEvent
tools.description: Responds to a meeting invitation (accept, decline, or tentative).

tools.name: calendar.deleteEvent
tools.description: Deletes an event from a calendar.

tools.name: chat.listSpaces
tools.description: Lists the spaces the user is a member of.

tools.name: chat.findSpaceByName
tools.description: Finds a Google Chat space by its display name.

tools.name: chat.sendMessage
tools.description: Sends a message to a Google Chat space.

tools.name: chat.getMessages
tools.description: Gets messages from a Google Chat space.

tools.name: chat.sendDm
tools.description: Sends a direct message to a user.

tools.name: chat.findDmByEmail
tools.description: Finds a Google Chat DM space by a user's email address.

tools.name: chat.listThreads
tools.description: Lists threads from a Google Chat space in reverse chronological order.

tools.name: chat.setUpSpace
tools.description: Sets up a new Google Chat space with a display name and a list of members.

tools.name: gmail.search
tools.description: Search for emails in Gmail using query parameters.

tools.name: gmail.get
tools.description: Get the full content of a specific email message.

tools.name: gmail.downloadAttachment
tools.description: Downloads an attachment from a Gmail message to a local file.

tools.name: gmail.modify
tools.description:
Modify a Gmail message. Supported modifications include:
    - Add labels to a message.
    - Remove labels from a message.
There are a list of system labels that can be modified on a message:
    - INBOX: removing INBOX label removes the message from inbox and archives the message.
    - SPAM: adding SPAM label marks a message as spam.
    - TRASH: adding TRASH label moves a message to trash.
    - UNREAD: removing UNREAD label marks a message as read.
    - STARRED: adding STARRED label marks a message as starred.
    - IMPORTANT: adding IMPORTANT label marks a message as important.

tools.name: gmail.send
tools.description: Send an email message.

tools.name: gmail.createDraft
tools.description: Create a draft email message.

tools.name: gmail.sendDraft
tools.description: Send a previously created draft email.

tools.name: gmail.listLabels
tools.description: List all Gmail labels in the user's mailbox.

tools.name: time.getCurrentDate
tools.description: Gets the current date. Returns both UTC (for calendar/API use) and local time (for display to the user), along with the timezone.

tools.name: time.getCurrentTime
tools.description: Gets the current time. Returns both UTC (for calendar/API use) and local time (for display to the user), along with the timezone.

tools.name: time.getTimeZone
tools.description: Gets the local timezone. Note: timezone is also included in getCurrentDate and getCurrentTime responses.

tools.name: people.getUserProfile
tools.description: Gets a user's profile information.

tools.name: people.getMe
tools.description: Gets the profile information of the authenticated user.

tools.name: auth.clear
tools.description: Clears the authentication credentials, forcing a re-login on the next request.

tools.name: auth.refreshToken
tools.description: Manually triggers the token refresh process.
